action_skill.name: Blunt Weapons
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with blunt weapons. Gain skill by using items from this group. Level 20 unlocks iron club. Level 30 unlocks barbed club. Level 40 unlocks spiked club.

action_skill.name: Mining Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage within mining tools and harvest resources faster. Level 20 unlocks iron pickaxe. Level 40 unlocks steel pickaxe.

action_skill.name: Construction Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage and harvest faster with stone axe, wrench, hammer and the nailgun. Level 20 unlocks hammer. Level 30 unlocks sledgehammer. Level 40 unlocks wrench.

action_skill.name: Axes
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with axes and harvest resources faster. Level 10 unlocks iron fireaxe. Level 20 unlocks steel fireaxe.

action_skill.name: Pistols
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with handguns. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble them. Level 30 unlocks silencer.

action_skill.name: Magnum
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with your Magnum. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble them. Level 30 unlocks silencer.

action_skill.name: Shotguns
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with spread weapons. Level up to 15 to assemble a sawed off shotgun. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble a pump shotgun.them. Level 30 unlocks shotgun choke.

action_skill.name: Sniper
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with Snipers. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble them. Level 30 unlocks silencer. Level 40 unlocks High-Powered scope.

action_skill.name: Assault Rifles
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with Assault Rifles. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble them. Level 30 unlocks silencer.

perk.name: Gun Rocket
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble a rocket launcher.

perk.name: Wooden Bow
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a wooden bow at level 5. Level 15 unlocks iron bow.

perk.name: Crossbow
perk.description_key: Level 10 unlocks crossbow. Level 20 unlocks iron crossbow. Level 30 unlocks crossbow repeater.

player_skill.name: Medicine
player_skill.description_key: Get more health from topical and consumable remedies. Gain skill by using items from this group. Learn new recipes every 5 levels until level 40.

perk.name: Leather Tanning
perk.description_key: Max this skill to unlock the ability to craft leather from animal hides or by scrapping leather items.

crafting_skill.name: Mechanical
crafting_skill.description_key: This skill levels the more you work with electronics and mechanical gear.

perk.name: Electric Lights
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft electric lights at the decor artisan station.

perk.name: Plumbing
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft plumbing kits to repair sinks for a clean source of drinking water.

perk.name: Oven Repair
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft Oven Repair kits to repair ovens for cooking without needing fuel.

perk.name: Lockpicks
perk.description_key: Max out to learn how to make lockpicks to unlock gun safes. Doesn't work on doors.

perk.name: Animal Traps
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft animal snares and coops to capture animals.

perk.name: Pottery
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft clay bowls, plates and clay Amphora which are all essential for various cooking recipes.

perk.name: Chainsaw
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble a chainsaw.

perk.name: Nailgun
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble a nailgun.

perk.name: Auger
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble an Auger.

perk.name: Minibike
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble together a minibike.

perk.name: Traps
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised traps. Every ten levels unlocks a new teir. Level 10 unlocks wood spikes. Level 20 unlocks explosive traps. Level 30 unlocks fire traps.

perk.name: Chemistry
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft chemicals and other recipes like the chemistry station, gunpowder, gas, glue, oil, and fuel logs.

perk.name: Garden Tools
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft various gardening tools.

perk.name: Improvised Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised armors. Level 5 unlocks animal hide armors. Level 10 unlocks leather armors. Level 15 unlocks scrap armor.

perk.name: Forged Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft armors out of forged iron or steel. Level 30 unlocks iron armor. Level 50 unlocks steel armor.

crafting_skill.name: Blacksmith
crafting_skill.description_key: Level this skill up by crafting various items and blocks in the forge. Levels 10, 20, 30, 50 and 80 all unlock new recipes.

crafting_skill.name: Carpentry
crafting_skill.description_key: Level this skill up to unlock more wood-related recipes such as woodframes and carpenter kits. Level 10 unlocks woodframe crafting.

perk.name: Glassworking
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft various glass items and blocks in the forge such as windows and glass jars.

perk.name: Security
perk.description_key: Level 5 unlocks wooden doors. Level 10 teaches how to craft secure storage containers, safes and iron doors in the Artisan Decor Station. Level 20 teaches the components needed for drawbridges.

perk.name: Junk Scrapping
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to scrap items to their base material.

perk.name: Masonry
perk.description_key: Learn how to build with stone. Level 20 unlocks cobblestone. Level 30 unlocks brick. Level 50 unlocks cement..

perk.name: Blunderbuss
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft a makeshift blunderbuss.
